description.value:
The wildfire druid's fiery friend can throw a Flame Seed, attacking with your the druid's spell attack modifier to hit, range 60 ft., one target you can see. Hit: 1d6 + proficency bonus fire damage

FoundryVTT: The VFX of this spell adjust in color based on a keyword found in the icon set for this item.  Recognized keywords:  blue, dark_green, green02, green, dark_red, orange, purple. The Icon is set to point to a folder that contains all supported options.

magicitems.destroyFlavorText: reaches 0 charges: it crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.
